comment: His lectures are very good. He makes sure to explain the topics he's covering in more than one way and covers everything that will be on the tests.

He's pretty old school, but overall a good choice! Regarding grading, he's relaxed. He mainly grades labs & tests. Labs themselves are due the next class period and others due the day of the lab. Tests are usually multiple choice,/TF and a couple short answer. Not that hard at all. With minimal studying, I've gotten A's on all the tests. Take him!
